parameter.name: lat
parameter.description: Latitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lng is required.

parameter.name: lng
parameter.description: Longitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lat is required.

parameter.name: foursquare_id
parameter.description: Returns a location mapped off of a foursquare v1 api location id. If used, you are not required to use lat and lng. Note that this method is deprecated; you should use the new foursquare IDs with V2 of their API.

parameter.name: foursquare_v2_id
parameter.description: Returns a location mapped off of a foursquare v2 api location id. If used, you are not required to use lat and lng.

parameter.name: distance
parameter.description: Search distance, in meters. Default is 1km (distance=1000), max distance is 5km (5000)
